function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of international coordination in WBE research for Covid-19 and other infectious diseases.","Impact":"Inefficient use of resources, duplication of efforts, and slower progress in developing WBE applications for disease detection.","Mitigation":"Establishing a web-based database as a clearing house for research activities, and fostering international collaboration among WBE principal investigators.","Technologies":"Web-based database for information sharing and collaboration tools for virtual communication.","People":"WBE principal investigators, international research community, public health organizations.","Owner":"International community of WBE scientists, public health organizations."}]}
